content.rendered:
Helping Victims Of Defective Appliances Recover Compensation

American households are generally full of appliances designed to make our lives easier. When they work well, they can enhance our lifestyles. When they malfunction, they can cause problems, including accidental injuries or even death.

A Law Firm With A History Of Success

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, our Columbus, Ohio, law firm has a history of success representing people injured by dangerous and defective products.

We often represent those who have suffered injuries from:

  • Refrigerators
  • Stoves
  • Microwave ovens
  • Dishwashers
  • Vacuum cleaners
  • Blenders or food processors
  • Toaster ovens
  • Hair dryers
  • Dehumidifiers
  • Space heaters
  • Air conditioners
  • Irons
  • Washers and dryers
  • Smoke detectors

You may have suffered burn injuries when a product overheated or caught on fire because of an electrical defect. You may have suffered a serious injury after a stove or refrigerator tipped over. A family member may have been electrocuted when safety features failed. You may have inhaled too much smoke after a fire when a smoke detector malfunctioned.

These types of injuries could give rise to a legal cause of action.

Our attorneys welcome the opportunity to advise you on how to get compensation for your medical bills and other losses.

Contact Our Office Today. Free Consultations Provided

We invite you to contact our office today to schedule a free consultation with one of our lawyers. You can call 614-360-2706 or send us a confidential email.
